entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:36 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
